solution_line_template: There are {clovers_3_petals} clovers with 3 leaves because {total_clovers} times {three_petal_percentage_decimal} equals <<{total_clovers}*{three_petal_percentage_decimal}={clovers_3_petals}>>{clovers_3_petals}.

There are {clovers_2_petals} clovers with 2 leaves because {total_clovers} times {two_petal_percentage_decimal} equals <<{total_clovers}*{two_petal_percentage_decimal}={clovers_2_petals}>>{clovers_2_petals}.

There are {clovers_4_petals} clovers with 4 leaves because {total_clovers} times {four_petal_percentage_decimal} equals <<{total_clovers}*{four_petal_percentage_decimal}={clovers_4_petals}>>{clovers_4_petals}.

The four-leaf clovers are worth {value_3_petal_clovers} cents because {clovers_3_petals} times {petals_per_3_leaf_clover} equals <<{clovers_3_petals}*{petals_per_3_leaf_clover}={value_3_petal_clovers}>>{value_3_petal_clovers}

The two leafed clovers are worth {value_2_petal_clovers} cents because {clovers_2_petals} times {petals_per_2_leaf_clover} equals <<{clovers_2_petals}*{petals_per_2_leaf_clover}={value_2_petal_clovers}>>{value_2_petal_clovers}

The four-leaf clovers are worth {value_4_petal_clovers} cents because {clovers_4_petals} times {multiplier_for_4_leaf_clover_value} equals <<{clovers_4_petals}*{multiplier_for_4_leaf_clover_value}={value_4_petal_clovers}>>{value_4_petal_clovers}.

The clovers are worth {total_cents} cents because {value_3_petal_clovers} plus {value_2_petal_clovers} plus {value_4_petal_clovers} equals <<{value_3_petal_clovers}+{value_2_petal_clovers}+{value_4_petal_clovers}={total_cents}>>{total_cents}
